com.google.code.arm.sql
Class AutoCloseDriverManager

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.arm.sql.AutoCloseDriverManager

public class AutoCloseDriverManager
extends Object

Utility similar to DriverManager for returning AutoCloseable connections from the DriverManager.

Method Detail

getConnection

public static AutoCloseConnection getConnection(String url)
                                         throws SQLException
Attempts to establish a connection to the given database URL. The DriverManager attempts to select an appropriate driver from the set of registered JDBC drivers.

Parameters:
url - a database URL of the form jdbc:subprotocol:subname
Returns:
an AutoCloseable Connection to the URL
Throws:
SQLException - if a database access error occurs

getConnection

public static AutoCloseConnection getConnection(String url,
                                                String user,
                                                String password)
                                         throws SQLException
Attempts to establish a connection to the given database URL. The DriverManager attempts to select an appropriate driver from the set of registered JDBC drivers.

Parameters:
url - a database URL of the form jdbc:subprotocol:subname
user - the database user on whose behalf the connection is being made
password - the user's password
Returns:
an AutoCloseable Connection to the URL
Throws:
SQLException - if a database access error occurs

getConnection

public static AutoCloseConnection getConnection(String url,
                                                Properties properties)
                                         throws SQLException
Attempts to establish a connection to the given database URL. The DriverManager attempts to select an appropriate driver from the set of registered JDBC drivers.

Parameters:
url - a database URL of the form jdbc:subprotocol:subname
properties - a list of arbitrary string tag/value pairs as connection arguments; normally at least a "user" and "password" property should be included
Returns:
an AutoCloseable Connection to the URL
Throws:
SQLException - if a database access error occurs

getDriver

public static AutoCloseDriver getDriver(String url)
                                 throws SQLException
Attempts to locate a driver that understands the given URL. The DriverManager attempts to select an appropriate driver from the set of registered JDBC drivers.

Parameters:
url - a database URL of the form jdbc:subprotocol:subname
Returns:
an AutoCloseable Driver object representing a driver that can connect to the given URL
Throws:
SQLException - if a database access error occurs
